mapper.insert: insert into user_location (uid, curr_nation, curr_province, curr_city, curr_district, location, longitude, latitude, create_time, update_time, remove_status) values (#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{currNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update user_location set curr_nation = #{currNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, curr_province = #{currProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, curr_city = #{currCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, curr_district = #{currDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remove_status = #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select uid, curr_nation, curr_province, curr_city, curr_district, location, longitude, latitude, create_time, update_time, remove_status from user_location where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select uid, curr_nation, curr_province, curr_city, curr_district, location, longitude, latitude, create_time, update_time, remove_status from user_location
